event.title: JavaScript for accessible websites
event.description:
An introduction to building for accessibility while coding up your modern, dynamic web applications in JavaScript.

In this talk, Jon Gibbins will explain how dynamic content works with assistive technology and demonstrate a few accessible coding techniques.Â Assuming some knowledge of JavaScript, he'll introduce WAI-ARIA and show what it can do, and tool you up with some best practices for some common accessibility problems.
